alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft; Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 26 at 8:57PM MST until February 27 at 1:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. * WHERE...Huerfano, Las Animas and Baca Counties. * WHEN...Until 1 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds may blow down trees and power lines. Power outages will be possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Las Animas County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft; Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft
